title: SilenceX ~ Newstreamer/AnimeFan/Soloque Player come and join me :)
body:
Hello guys I´m {{champion:39}} SilenceX and i just started streaming.
I´ll mostly stream League of Legends and sometimes Hearthstone.
Actually im a BIG Anime fan and if you´re one too then join me and talk to me :)
Feel free to ask Questions and i´ll try to answer them as soon as possible.
I´m a very funny and kind person so be nice to me.
My main roles are kinda ADC and the TOP Lane cuz of epicness :D
Mainchampions? Well you can kinda imagine them... {{champion:39}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}}  <3
The Current Elo on my Main is Platinum 3 but im pretty sure im gonna skyrock the preseason now.
Any other infos such as Streaming time and online time u gonna see on my Twitter/Twitch.
So if u feel like watching some epic plays come, join and enjoy it :)
